preclusion: IE4231 - Statistical Methods for Process Design and Control
description: This module introduces students to the fundamental concepts of process design and quality control in engineering system. The topics covered are measures and interpretation of process performance, design and analysis of experiments, process optimization, quality control, anomaly detection, and basic tools in reliability analysis and testing. It will enable students to use statistical techniques in process studies and learn to deal with problems from a proactive point of view.
title: Statistical Methods for Process Design & Control
prerequisite: IE3101 Statistics for Engineering Applications or its equivalent
